summary: Email correspondence between U.S. Attorney's Office personnel regarding an Epstein-related 6(e) application document. The email includes an attachment of the application and order, and indicates a co-chief of the Public Corruption Unit will come by.

persons.name: S USANYS
persons.context: Appears as the sender and recipient in email correspondence about an Epstein 6(e) application document.

events.title: Epstein 6(e) Application & Order
events.description: Reference to a 6(e) application and order document related to the Epstein case, attached to the email.

events.title: Email Correspondence Regarding Epstein Document
events.description: Email exchange between U.S. Attorney's Office personnel discussing the Epstein 6(e) application document and arranging to meet.

locations: U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York
keyFacts: Email correspondence involves U.S. Attorney's Office personnel discussing an Epstein-related 6(e) application document.
The attached document is dated December 19, 2019, titled 'Epstein_6(e)_App_&_Order'.
The correspondence indicates the involvement of the Public Corruption Unit of the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The email suggests a meeting or handoff regarding the Epstein document was planned.
